recipes.name: Alchemical Catalyst
recipes.description:
Produces 8, plus additional based on Alchemy skill. 

May also yield Sorcerous Fire and/or Sorcerous Water.

Cooldown resets daily.

recipes.name: Alchemical Catalyst - Fireweed
recipes.description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

recipes.name: Alchemical Catalyst - Flytrap
recipes.description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

recipes.name: Alchemical Catalyst - Starflower
recipes.description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

recipes.name: Alchemical Catalyst - Orchid
recipes.description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

recipes.name: Alchemical Catalyst - Lotus
recipes.description: Generates the reagents needed to create the most powerful alchemical items of Draenor. Can only be performed once a day. Shares cooldown with other Alchemist's Cauldrons.

recipes.name: Alchemical Catalyst
recipes.description:
Produces 10. May also yield Sorcerous Fire and/or Sorcerous Water.

Can be performed up to three times in a row, but it takes 24 hours to recover 1 use.

recipes.name: Secrets of Draenor Alchemy
recipes.description: Cooldown resets daily.

recipes.name: Riddle of Steel
recipes.description:
When performing this transmute, you have a chance to learn additional recipes.

The number of recipes you can learn is limited by your skill in Alchemy.

Using Spirits of Harmony to create Living Steel does not tax the alchemist, allowing them to ignore the normal one day of rest.

recipes.name: Transmute: Amberjewel
recipes.description: Transmutes lesser yellow gems and the timeless essense of whiptail to create an amberjewel.

recipes.name: Transmute: Demonseye
recipes.description: Transmutes lesser purple gems and the magical essense of twilight jasmine to create a demonseye.

recipes.name: Transmute: Dream Emerald
recipes.description: Transmutes lesser green gems and the electrical currents of stormvine to create a dream emerald.

recipes.name: Transmute: Ember Topaz
recipes.description: Transmutes lesser orange gems and the fiery essense of cinderbloom to create an ember topaz.

recipes.name: Transmute: Inferno Ruby
recipes.description: Transmutes lesser red gems and the essence of the heartblossom to create an inferno ruby.

recipes.name: Transmute: Truegold
recipes.description: Transmutes pyrium bars into truegold.

recipes.name: Transmute: Living Elements
recipes.description: Transforms the essence of life into another element.  The exact result is not known ahead of time.

recipes.name: Transmute: Ocean Sapphire
recipes.description: Transmutes lesser blue gems and the oils from Azshara's Veil to create an ocean sapphire.

recipes.name: Transmute: Pyrium Bar
recipes.description: Transmutes elementium and volatile earth into a pyrium bar.

recipes.name: Transmute: Shadowspirit Diamond
recipes.description: Transmute several lesser gems into a beautiful shadowspirit diamond.

recipes.name: Transmute: Eternal Air to Earth
recipes.description: Transmutes Eternal Air to Earth.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

recipes.name: Transmute: Eternal Might
recipes.description: Transmutes Eternal Life to Shadow.

recipes.name: Transmute: Skyflare Diamond
recipes.description: Transmute the element of air and gems into a Skyflare Diamond.

recipes.name: Transmute: Earthsiege Diamond
recipes.description: Transmute the element of fire and gems into a Earthsiege Diamond.

recipes.name: Transmute: Titanium
recipes.description: Transmutes many saronite bars into a single titanium bar.  You have a chance to discover other transmutations when successful.

recipes.name: Transmute: Eye of Zul
recipes.description: Transmute several Forest Emeralds into an Eye of Zul.

recipes.name: Transmute: Ametrine
recipes.description: Transmute the element of shadow and a Monarch Topaz into an Ametrine.

recipes.name: Transmute: Cardinal Ruby
recipes.description: Transmute the element of fire and a Scarlet Ruby into a Cardinal Ruby.

recipes.name: Transmute: King's Amber
recipes.description: Transmute the element of life and a Autumn's Glow into King's Amber.

recipes.name: Transmute: Dreadstone
recipes.description: Transmute the element of shadow and a Twilight Opal into a Dreadstone.

recipes.name: Transmute: Majestic Zircon
recipes.description: Transmute the element of air and a Sky Sapphire into a Majestic Zircon.

recipes.name: Northrend Alchemy Research
recipes.description: Experiment with Northrend herbs to discover a new Alchemy recipe.  Can only be done every 3 days.

recipes.description: Transmutes Earth into Water.

recipes.description: Transmutes Fire into Earth.

recipes.description: Purifies Essence of Undeath turning it into Water.

recipes.description: Transmutes Water into Air.

recipes.description: Transmutes a Heart of Fire into three Elemental Fires.
